author: Dan Gallagher
title: Micron’s Results Weren’t Quite Chipper Enough - WSJ
text:
Sometimes there really is nowhere to go but down.
Things have been going very well at Micron Technology for a while now. Strong demand and pricing for memory chips have driven the chipmaker’s sales and earnings to record levels. Fiscal second-quarter results reported late Thursday were no exception. Revenue surged 58% year-over-year to $7.4 billion, beating Wall Street’s estimates, while operating earnings surged to $3.6 billion—more than triple the previous year’s result.
...
